The good conscience. Or, The soules banquet royall. In a sermon by T.P. Pestell, Thomas, 1584?-1659?
[4], 31, [1] p.
Imprinted by Thomas Creede, for Arthur Iohnson, and are to bee solde at his shoppe in Paules Churchyard, at the White Horse, neere the great north dore of S. Paules, London : 1615.
Dedication signed: Thomas Pestell. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
